effect.sword_shield: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect.legends_arceus: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.

short_effect.sword_shield: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
